mapper.select: /* getChatRoomList 사용자의 채팅방 목록 조회 */ SELECT T1.ROOM_IDX , T1.TITLE , T1.CHAT_ROOM_TYPE , T1.MEMBER_CNT , T1.LAST_CHAT_MSG , T2.UNREAD_COUNT AS unreadMessageCount , T1.LAST_CHAT_DT FROM ch_chat_room T1, ch_chat_room_member T2 WHERE T1.ROOM_IDX = T2.ROOM_IDX AND T2.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND T2.DEL_YN = 'N'
